scripts.reset:db: yarn destroy:db && yarn start:db && sleep 5 && yarn migrate:db && yarn seed:db
scripts.destroy:db: docker-compose --env-file ./.env.development down && yes | docker volume prune
scripts.migrate:db: NODE_ENV=development yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.seed:db: NODE_ENV=development yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.seed:test: NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate || true && NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all || true
scripts.test: yes | yarn reset:db && NODE_ENV=test serverless-bundle test --verbose --silent --noStackTrace --runInBand --colors --collectCoverage --detectOpenHandles
